title: Income, prices double, Clark buys same amounts

content.prompt: Assume that Clark spends his entire income on the purchase of two goods, X and Y. If his income and the prices of good X and Y all double, Clark will

choices.label: double the purchase of goods X and Y
buy more of good X and less of good Y
buy less of good X and more of good Y
buy less of both goods X and Y
buy the same amounts of goods X and Y

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
